channel.title: [508] changing npc name?
channel.description: Hi, i am new to rsps making, and i was wondering if it was possible to change the name of an NPC. i know it is possible to change the hp and stuff. it is a 508 server, using davidscape source.

item.title: [508] changing npc name?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:357914”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=454425.msg3327560#msg3327560 date=1283219159]

That’s client sided.

You also have to change it server sided, in npclist or something like that (I dont do 508 anymore :P)
[/quote]Well yes, but that’s not as important; the server sided only matters when you do things like chat with npc’s.[/quote]

Right, so if he was renaming that one Hans character to Joshua lovesbigdickinhismouth, he would need to change it in both, since you talk to Hans.

Read full topic

That’s client sided.
[/quote]

You also have to change it server sided, in npclist or something like that (I dont do 508 anymore :P)[/quote]Well yes, but that’s not as important; the server sided only matters when you do things like chat with npc’s.
